definition: administrative committee/management committee/abbr. for 管理委員會|管理委员会[guan3 li3 wei3 yuan2 hui4]

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: I was part of the student government in the dorms.
sentences.chinese: 我是學生宿舍管委會的成員。

sentences.english: The MC inside the screen was to be removed later by acidizing.
sentences.chinese: 管委會內屏幕則必須拆除後酸化。

sentences.english: It enjoys municipal level authority in economy management.
sentences.chinese: 開發區管委會享有地市級經濟管理權限。

sentences.english: If an exemption is still necessary after these periods of exemption expire, it depends on the decision of the ETDZAC.
sentences.chinese: 免稅期滿後需要繼續減免的，由開發區管委會決定。

sentences.english: In charge of Chenggong New Area Administrative Committee, Kunming Xindu Investment Co., Ltd..
sentences.chinese: 分管呈貢新區管委會，昆明新都投資有限公司。

sentences.english: A second new application was setting MC across producing perforations for a temporary abandonment plug.
sentences.chinese: 第二個新申請設置管委會橫跨產齒孔爲暫時放棄堵塞。

sentences.english: Hello dear friends, I am the Director of the Administrative Committee.
sentences.chinese: 各位朋友大家好，我是這個景區的管委會主任。

sentences.english: Deputy Director of the Management Committee of PUYUAN sweater market Zhu Shaoming said.
sentences.chinese: 濮院羊毛衫市場管委會副主任朱少明如是說。

sentences.english: Luo Shehui, director of the Administrative Commission of the Changsha High-tech Industrial Development Zone, attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 長沙高新區管委會主任羅社輝參加會見。

sentences.english: In charge of Chenggong New Area Administrative Committee, Kunming Xindu Investment Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 分管呈貢新區管委會，昆明新都投資有限公司。

definition: secretary (chief official of a branch of a socialist or communist party)/clerk/scribe
head of a (government etc) department/section chief/section head/secretary/minister/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council (abbr. for 國務院港澳事務辦公室|国务院港澳事务办公室[Guo2 wu4 yuan4 Gang3 Ao4 Shi4 wu4 Ban4 gong1 shi4])

Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (abbr. for 中央人民政府駐香港特別行政區聯絡辦公室|中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区联络办公室[Zhong1 yang1 Ren2 min2 Zheng4 fu3 Zhu4 Xiang1 gang3 Te4 bie2 Xing2 zheng4 qu1 Lian2 luo4 Ban4 gong1 shi4]) or the equivalent office in Macao
abbr. for 民主建港協進聯盟|民主建港协进联盟, Democratic alliance for the betterment of Hong Kong (DAB), Hong Kong pro-Beijing party
(political, economic etc) affairs/work/transaction (as in a computer database)
